title: Sworn Enemies (1996) Ex-cop. Ex-friend. Only one walks away from this showdown.

sources.title: Sworn Enemies (1996) Ex-cop. Ex-friend. Only one walks away from this showdown.
sources.description:
Pershing, a small-town deputy with a knack for trouble, chases his old war buddy Santier from the Midwest to Montreal after a heist goes sideways. When these two ex-comrades finally meet, it’s less hugs, more headlocks—nobody’s playing nice.

Director: Shimon Dotan
Writers: Rod Hewitt

Main cast:
Michael Paré – Pershing
Macha Grenon – Sierra
Peter Greene – Santier
Michel Perron – Arnold
Ian MacDonald – Lester Kling
Robert Morelli – Boot
Brea Asher – Dale Carver
Alan Fawcett – Jack Silver
Ernie Jackson – Uncle William
Don Jordan – Bags
Christopher Heyerdahl – Judd Lush
Matt Holland – Les Lush
Barry Blake – Sheriff Pritchard
David Rigby – Lou
Peter Cox – Rick
Daniel Skorzewski – Riddles
Chip Chuipka – Styles
HoJo Rose (Howard Rosenstein) – Ted Garmond

Genres: Action, Adventure
Release date: June 8, 1996 
Filming location: Montréal, Québec, Canada

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYTMq_LE7cyJT3fio8pHOP8

@CultCinemaClassics
